summaryAsHtml:
Learn how to set your environment up from scratch, develop a simple app, test it, integrating CSS frameworks (Angular Material or Bootstrap), secure it with OpenID Connect, and deploy it to the cloud. Could even turn it into a PWA if there's time.

Pre-requisites:

  • Node.js
  • npm
  • Angular CLI
title: The Ultimate Getting Started with Angular Workshop
summary:
Learn how to set your environment up from scratch, develop a simple app, test it, integrating CSS frameworks (Angular Material or Bootstrap), secure it with OpenID Connect, and deploy it to the cloud. Could even turn it into a PWA if there's time.

**Pre-requisites:**

  * Node.js 
  * npm
  * Angular CLI
